DOC.criteria: A histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis nonmucinous epithelial ovarian cancer include primary peritoneal fallopian tube malignancy Must measurable disease CT MRI scan Must relapse radiologically randomization date within ≥6 < 24 month completion firstline platinum chemotherapy Have treat debulking surgery firstline platinum taxane base chemotherapy . Prior bevacizumbab maintenance allow . The last dose bevacizumab must least 30 day study Day 1 . No cytotoxic maintenance therapy ( e.g . taxane ) cancer vaccine therapy allow .
